text: @MiaFarrow Yet the CDC's own numbers show total mortality % in the US is the same as the previous 3 years. MORE people are not dying. Their deaths are being reclassified as Covid-19 because CARES Act pays hospitals 20% more for treating Covid-19 patients. Follow the money.
